page.title: 07OUR SCHOOL ORGANISATION
page.content: Classroom organisation sees the children working in groups. Some children will be working in the teaching area where there are tables and chairs and a blackboard. Equipment is stored in drawer units arranged around the room. Other children will be found working at various activities in the quiet corner, wet area and wing area. The shared areas (hall, TV room, music room) are timetabled between the classes. For other areas of the curriculum the individual teacher plans and manages his/her own day.The computer is also timetabled to visit each classroom once a week. The school day is as follows:- {8.50} Start/registration {9.00} Assembly.{10.30-10.45} Playtime {11.45-1pm.} Lunchtime. {2.30-2.45} Playtime. {3.20} Home time.
